text: Martigny-Combe is a municipality of the district of Martigny in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. ==Villages== Martigny-Croix, Le Brocard, Le Borgeaud, Les Rappes, La Fontaine, Le Cergneux, Le Fays, Le Sommet-des-Vignes and Ravoire. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Municipalities in Martigny
title: Martigny-Combe
